entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
